en.home_description: Store, share, and access your files from anywhere
en.question1: What is your mother's maiden name?
en.question2: What was your first pet's name?
en.question3: What city were you born in?
en.question4: What is your favorite teacher's name?
en.question5: What was your first car model?
en.check_email: Check your email for reset link
en.reset_link_sent: Reset link sent to your email
en.password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters
en.404_message: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
en.403_message: You don't have permission to access this page.
en.500_message: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

am.home_description: ፋይሎችዎን ከማንኛውም ቦታ ያከማቹ፣ ያጋሩ እና ይድረሱ
am.question1: የእናትህ ቀድሞዋ የነበረው ስም ማን ነው?
am.question2: የመጀመሪያው የቤት እንስሳህ ስም ማን ነበር?
am.reset_link_sent: የዳግም አስጀመሪያ አገናኝ ወደ ኢሜይልህ ተልኳል
am.password_requirements: የይለፍ ቃል ቢያንስ 8 ፊደላት ሊኖሩት ይገባል
am.500_message: በኛ በኩል አንድ ስህተት ተከስቷል። እባክዎ ቆይተው እንደገና ይሞክሩ።

om.home_description: Faayilota keessan haala jijjiiramaa irraa qusadhu, qoodsi, fi dhaqqaabi
om.check_email: Itti aansee firii emailii keessatti ilaali
om.password_requirements: Jecha iccitii lakkoofsa herregaa 8 ol qabaachuu qaba
om.404_message: Fuula feetan hin argamuu ykn deebi'ame.
om.403_message: Fuula kana dhaqqabsiif hayyama hin qabdu.
om.500_message: Nuuf waliin waan dogoggoru uumame. Mee yeroo booda irra deebi'i.
